rows.label: bf04280100_0010
rows.name: So, we meet again, Holy Grail!

rows.label: bf04280100_0020
rows.name: Oh. It's Shellhead.

rows.label: bf04280100_0030
rows.name: Yes! Wait, who's "Shellhead"?!

rows.label: bf04280100_0040
rows.name: As ever, your comic timing is exquisite.

rows.label: bf04280100_0050
rows.name:
You will address me as Zeke B Ultimate Genbu, Bringer of
Chaos!

rows.label: bf04280100_0052
rows.name: Or Zeke! Or THE ZEKENATOR!

rows.label: bf04280100_0060
rows.name:
Make your mind up.
And what the hell is a Zekenator, anyway?

rows.label: bf04280100_0070
rows.name:
Hah! You may have been lucky last time,
thanks to a certain unstable cliff...

rows.label: bf04280100_0075
rows.name: But this time round we meet on good old terra firma!

rows.label: bf04280100_0080
rows.name:
If you think you can run from me a
second time, you are quite mistaken!

rows.label: bf04280100_0090
rows.name:
Nobody did any running...
And anyway, Shellhead?

rows.label: bf04280100_0100
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf04280100_0110
rows.name: You answer to that now?

rows.label: bf04280100_0120
rows.name: I've been wondering for a while now...

rows.label: bf04280100_0122
rows.name: but what's with the cutesy eyepatch?

rows.label: bf04280100_0130
rows.name: Heh... I'm quite glad you asked.

rows.label: bf04280100_0140
rows.name:
This eyepatch conceals a power too great for mere
mortals to comprehend...

rows.label: bf04280100_0142
rows.name: The Eye of Shining Justice!

rows.label: bf04280100_0150
rows.name:
I am sworn to keep it sealed until its power
is needed to save mankind.

rows.label: bf04280100_0160
rows.name:
You should count yourselves lucky.
It would turn you to ash in seconds!

rows.label: bf04280100_0170
rows.name: Whatever you say, pal.

rows.label: bf04280100_0180
rows.name:
He definitely isn't wearing it because he didn't
have the gold for a second contact lens.

rows.label: bf04280100_0190
rows.name:
How poor are you?!
And are you THAT short-sighted?!

rows.label: bf04280100_0200
rows.name: By the by, what business might you have with us today?

rows.label: bf04280100_0210
rows.name:
Are you thick?
I'm here for the Holy Grail, obviously!

rows.label: bf04280100_0220
rows.name:
Listen, pal. I'm sorry, but we really don't
have time to play with you today.

rows.label: bf04280100_0230
rows.name: So hurry on home, OK?

rows.label: bf04280100_0240
rows.name: What's this?

rows.label: bf04280100_0243
rows.name:
Were you so frightened by our power
that you wet yourself, furry-ears?

rows.label: bf04280100_0250
rows.name: Did I WHAT? You've got a lotta nerve,

rows.label: bf04280100_0252
rows.name: you one-eyed monster!

rows.label: bf04280100_0260
rows.name:
N...Nia?
You do know "one-eyed monster" usually means-

rows.label: bf04280100_0270
rows.name: Huh?! Means what?!

rows.label: bf04280100_0280
rows.name: Um...

rows.label: bf04280100_0282
rows.name:
It's, ah...
Hikari, why are you blushing?

rows.label: bf04280100_0290
rows.name: Shut up!
